member.name: T:ManageUsers.BusinessLogic.Interface.IPasswordPolicy
member.summary: Interface containig methods to set the password policy for user passwords.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.BusinessLogic.Interface.IPasswordPolicy.DefaultPolicyAsync
member.summary: Sets the password policy to minimum 6 characters.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.BusinessLogic.Interface.IPasswordPolicy.LevelFourAsync
member.summary: Sets the password policy to minimum 8 characters, at least one number and letter.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.BusinessLogic.Interface.IPasswordPolicy.LevelOneAsync
member.summary: Sets the password policy to minimum 8 characters, at least one number, at least one upper and lower case letter.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.BusinessLogic.Interface.IPasswordPolicy.LevelThreeAsync
member.summary: Sets the password policy to minimum 8 characters, at least one number, one letter and one symbol.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.BusinessLogic.Interface.IPasswordPolicy.LevelTwoAsync
member.summary: Sets the password policy to minimum 8 characters, at least one number, one symbol, at least one upper and lower case letter.

member.name: T:ManageUsers.BusinessLogic.Interface.ISetupTables
member.summary: Interface with a method used to setup the tables of your database.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.BusinessLogic.Interface.ISetupTables.CreateTablesAsync
member.summary: A method to automatically create all the necessary tables for the database. This method must be used before any other method in the library can be used.

member.name: T:ManageUsers.BusinessLogic.Interface.IUserManager
